scripts.check:conflicts: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const walk=(d)=>fs.readdirSync(d,{withFileTypes:true}).flatMap(e=>{const p=path.join(d,e.name);return e.isDirectory()?walk(p):[p];});const bad=[];for(const f of walk('src')){if(!f.endsWith('.ts'))continue;const t=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');if(t.includes('<<<<<<<')||t.includes('=======')||t.includes('>>>>>>>'))bad.push(f);}if(bad.length){console.error('Merge conflict markers found:\n'+bad.join('\n'));process.exit(1);}console.log('OK');"
